MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties Clarkston, Carmunnock, East Kilbride and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.15pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected as we are carrying out line patrols in the Philipshill area and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.15pm on the 12th October 2020.
